channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1474875187690721280
item.description: For my government data nerds who have still resisted exploring what's happening in crypto, I want to highlight the open data angle. Open datasets = foundational in crypto, & people innovating wildly as a result. @alexisohanian references example from this week. Of course, DYOR. https://t.co/nMjO2mGHqF

item.title: #fr @ 1474866368134660097
item.description: @Medic4allHuman @caroline_lange1 @felicittina @NiusMarco @decoder_l Quiconque a comparé et analysé les données publiques de différents pays a constaté de grossières manipulations des chiffres. @NiusMarco , @scholle14000 , @decoder_l , et moi l'avons signalé maintes fois.

item.title: #en @ 1474783236899418119
item.description:
CBC is reporting just over 10k cases in QC yesterday (via QC’s open data portal).
All I want for Christmas is actual systemic approaches to fighting the virus at governance levels, I am angry about in-person exams (@mcgillu), sad about the govt not taking this seriously…

item.title: #de @ 1474767201932562437
#it @ 1474753457252880384
item.description: Iniziai, con la @fleinaudi, una battaglia per ottenere trasparenza sui dati della campagna vaccinale, ai fini di dare una comunicazione rigorosa e corretta ai cittadini e limitare la disinformazione. Non è bastato un anno per avere gli open data. https://t.co/sjOFPGepH2

item.title: #fr @ 1474601899437576193
item.description:
Selon une modélisation astucieuse réalisée à partir de données publiques américaines et européennes, les "vaccins COVID" auraient déjà causé la mort d'environ 150 000 américains. 😱
Source: https://t.co/y4aHM4ags0 https://t.co/Rh0Ee6OcXg

item.title: #en @ 1474571914869805058
item.description: Explored extracting data to track deforestation from multiple sources earlier in the year. With a bit more input for metadata on extractive concessions + governance docs, we should be able to publish open data on forests, communities affected and beneficial owners involved https://t.co/4h7pg2S9Cw

item.title: #en @ 1474518992790294529
item.description:
@levie @sarthakgh @matthuang I'm trying to help build all these things! On the Meta with open data comment, @desoprotocol is the closest thing. Was only launched in March and has had over 1M users and over 100 apps built on top of it.
Still very very early for all of this but he future is coming into focus

item.title: #en @ 1474500641741541382
item.description:
4 out of 10 middle-income countries are still fully closed or only partially open. (Data from @jpazvd ) See implications of keeping schools closed in our last report: ➡️ State of the Global Education Crisis
Report: https://t.co/4wA51BT2r9 https://t.co/Wd9AaQhYzH

item.title: #en @ 1474465297629212672
item.description: New cases are up dramatically again in both Ventura County and California. Hospitalization and ICU count are stable in VC and CA. Covid19 is continuing its winning ways. #Covid19 data as of 12/23/21 from the CA Open Data Portal. 1/3 https://t.co/daUWG9TZcP

item.title: #nl @ 1474456026267201536
item.description: Nu https://t.co/RTioPEG2GU weer nachtelijk offline is en onder de kerstboom een mooie #databankenrecht uitspraak ligt, een verrassing voor alle volgers die zijn gebleven: #opendata is de enige garantie op uptime. @OpenStateEU https://t.co/LwEaZcuIA1 https://t.co/6zVXf54oP5

item.title: #fr @ 1474454870518382593
item.description:
Mise à jour avec les données du 24/12 🧵
- Je ne posterai pas de mise à jour de la proportion de non-L452R (Omicron) en Île-de-France ce soir. Il y a de moins en moins de résultats de criblage en open data, et le point de données délissées du jour ne me parait pas fiable.▫️1/7

item.title: #pt @ 1474451012052205572
item.description: PS: São estimativas de hospitalizações pela síndrome respiratória aguda grave (SRAG). Mesma estimativa divulgada semanalmente no InfoGripe. A diferença, eu usei dados abertos da SES-RJ, no InfoGripe usamos dados enviados semanalmente pelo ministério. +

item.title: #ca @ 1474401598088658945
item.description:
Publiquem un conjunt de dades que inclou els articles i programes del nostre web. És un corpus monolingüe en català amb un total de 953 documents i 416025 paraules amb llicència CC BY-SA 4.0. #dadesobertes
Vegeu: https://t.co/dR4wjtK8wF

item.title: #en @ 1474369803796332546
item.description: True, there are scams, PoW seems unsustainable, etc, but none of this changes the fact that (1) BTC distributed consensus was a landmark achievement, (2) software is eating the world (@a16z), (3) eventually most law will be software-defined, powered by open source + open data.

item.title: #en @ 1474341584653197330
item.description:
Web 3.0 is an upgrade to the Web, a meta technology for business software, a social movement for open data, and a new generation for artificial intelligence.
Find out more Information at https://t.co/cm1xKxh776 🚀
#Engineering https://t.co/kgt0yg2msG

item.title: #fr @ 1474329630962335795
item.description: #COVID19 Données #DREES en #opendata. Du 15/11 au 12/12/2021, les non vaccinés représentent 9 % de la population de + de 20 ans mais : 24 % des tests PCR+ symptomatiques, 42 % des admissions à l'hôpital, 54 % des entrées en soins critiques, 39 % des décès.https://t.co/LwW4U8D51z https://t.co/akASyiRHev

item.title: #en @ 1474287938083061762
item.description: Hey hello dear people who care to follow my account. Thanks for all your support and dialogue this year. Let's keep on twittering on the important issues: #ClimateJustice and #OpenData For today merry days and #GodJul from me to you! 🧚‍♂️ https://t.co/H68A3bxZfJ

item.description:
(Geen bewijs dat vaccins oversterfte veroorzaken. Wel dat ze tegen Delta beschermen. En veel landen met hoge vacc% recent GEEN oversterfte)
▶️ Geen eenduidige conclusie zonder doodsoorzaakcijfers: 3/1 over augustus
Ook #opendata in @statistiekcbs bericht https://t.co/xPfyTwENXN

item.title: #en @ 1474246594488905735
item.description:
2/ If you look at the counts of COVID cases and subsequent hospitalizations, they tend to track each other quite closely, but with a lag of 5-6 days
Deaths follow hospitalizations, by about 12 days. (it's too soon for that)
[Big props to my alma mater @nycHealthy for #opendata]

item.title: #fr @ 1474230761083576321
item.description:
@AnneVigliecca @JuliaCerisi Le contraire eut été étonnant, au vu des données publiques de plusieurs pays y compris la France montrant une sur-représentation des vaccinés hospitalisés et décédés parmi les cas de PCR+.
https://t.co/mcmLyeOIVN

item.title: #en @ 1474195879154257953
item.description:
Before our baby arrived, I made a bot using Alberta open data to visualize baby-name trends.
I've since been trying to learn basic web development & turn the bot into an app anyone can use.
Here's my 1st crack at it:
https://t.co/GsFSpt6htn
Give it a try. Feedback welcome!👶 https://t.co/llUFveMZkY

item.title: #en @ 1474171979796295690
item.description: Curious to know where our arts funding was allocated in 2019-20? Stats and Stories presents breakdowns of funding, five-year trends, open data tables and stories about what artists, groups + arts organizations did with their grants: https://t.co/uD6zQZpyXB #BringingTheArtsToLife https://t.co/ukKu4muSHb

item.title: #en @ 1474156618820505609
item.description:

The initial GTFS-R release delivers trip updates, vehicle positions, and occupancy data for Metro trains.
https://t.co/1TNoEIySXr https://t.co/LWxKKqRMlm
#OpenData @VicGovDoT @VicGovAu

item.title: #pt @ 1474140602023518212
item.description: Foram utilizados dados abertos em nível individual da síndrome respiratória aguda grave (SRAG) para o ano de 2021 disponíveis em no site da secretaria estadual de saúde do RIo de Janeiro (https://t.co/oJU0qfGdmv) (Acessado em 22 de dezembro de 2021).

item.title: #en @ 1474135905384349707
item.description: Knowing the limitations of a single study, it's best to consider individual reports in the context of others - we have a lot more confidence if independent groups have similar findings. @ncats_nih_gov has a tracker compiling these studies: https://t.co/aCvlWG5So6 (13/n)

item.title: #de @ 1474126594109231109
item.description:
Wäre die Schweiz so drauf wie Taiwan hätten wir ein digitales Open Data Dashboard mit Angaben zu allen verfügbaren Lagerbeständen von #Masken und #Selbsttests in Apotheken, Drogerien und Supermärkten im ganzen Land.
Aber eben: Sind wir nicht.

item.title: #es @ 1474091468235149314
item.description: En casos de crisis médica, como este, la política de datos abiertos es imperativa y si, como parece, esta no se da o se sospecha que no se da, lo imperativo es una inmediata comparecencia del gobierno para despejar todas las dudas que puedan existir.

item.title: #fr @ 1474088217272111115
item.description: - Je suis désespérée de vous annoncer que ce que j'ai anticipé vendredi soir dernier à la publication du DGS-urgent semble se réaliser : la lumière s'éteint actuellement peu à peu dans les données publiques de criblage ▫️2/3 https://t.co/hbzlx91N0d https://t.co/mPMMqStdJy

item.title: #es @ 1474083423018885121
item.description: ¿Sabías qué? En el período 1993-2020, la ciudad de Los Ángeles fue una de las que creció de manera más acelerada en Chile (4,4%). Le siguen Curicó, Puerto Montt, Castro y La Serena-Coquimbo. #DinámicasUrbanas. Encuentra más información en #GeoportalMinvu Geoportal Open Data Minvu https://t.co/lbJGKxcHWF

item.title: #en @ 1474076233423982596
item.description: Nos vamos a tomar una semana para volver con todas las fuerzas en Enero 2022! Felices fiestas! We are taking a week off to recharge and come back energized for 2022! Happy holidays everyone! 🎉 #OpenData https://t.co/RbzF4GQbX7

item.title: #en @ 1474057618700345350
item.description: “#Landsat’s free & open data policy allows our coastline mapping methods to be easily scaled up & applied to other coastal regions, lowering barriers to understanding recent patterns & processes of coastal change globally.” —R. Bishop-Taylor @SatelliteSci https://t.co/Pd8oJRNwuF

item.title: #es @ 1474055924532797445
item.description: Minería. Tras el fuerte rechazo en Chubut, un ambicioso plan minero para avanzar a nivel nacional queda en stand by. Antes lanzarán un sistema de datos abiertos y convocarán a ambientalistas. Piden a los empresarios mineros "terminar con el hermetismo". Nota en @Ambitocom https://t.co/GwIQD1OpAe

item.title: #es @ 1474049947075022854
item.description:
📊¿Te interesa analizar el impacto de una convocatoria de #matchfunding tan innovadora como #Matchimpulsa?

#OpenData #Transparencia https://t.co/91S2LV6zCl

item.title: #es @ 1474049833182928919
item.description: Me comentan de una de las regiones que hay más de 40K vacunas que se vencen el proximo 31 dic. Otro resultado de una mala planeación, distribución y logística. En @MinSaludCol solo hablan de los logros, pero muy poca autocrítica, pero como no hay datos abiertos. @JFernandeznino

item.title: #pt @ 1474047476940386310
item.description:
Políticas feitas sem dados abertos são políticas feitas para cumprir agendas com interesses escusos, sem transparência e, principalmente, sem democracia.
A quem interessa esse silêncio com dados públicos, enquanto aumentam casos e internações? +

=> #Academisch Onderzoek en echt #OpenData dus https://t.co/uoPJbcaya0

item.title: #pt @ 1473975085925122048
item.description: As funções do xlFOCUS que puxam dados do Focus também puxam dados de outros sistemas do site do BC, como os do SPI (Sistema de Pagamentos Instantâneos). É a filosofia dos dados abertos e padronizados disseminando a informação!

item.title: #fr @ 1473975014898683904
item.description:
[Thread autocritique]
En fin de semaine dernière, inquiète de l'écart entre les déclarations publiques et ce que je voyais dans les données publiques de criblage, j'ai voulu publier un visuel fort pour avertir de l’imminence de la vague Omicron▫️1/11

item.title: #fr @ 1473753188981518341
item.description:
Alors, quand même, de 10% à 5% d'administratifs à Valenciennes ça fait des économies ?
Du coup je suis allée sur les données (publiques, oui tout le monde y a accès).
Je commence par un hôpital lambda...
On voit qu'on retrouve peu ou pro les mêmes proportions : https://t.co/gynsjMisBx

item.title: #fr @ 1473749612020342784
item.description: J'espère qu'on continuera à avoir l'information de la colonne C (L452R) dans les données publiques, et qu'on a compris combien la continuité de cette info est importante pour le suivi d'Omicron. (Des données non pré-lissées, ce serait bien aussi...)▫️5/5

item.title: #en @ 1473649459930316811
item.description:
Thrilled that my first postdoc paper is now out @NeuroImage_EiC 🙌
Using open data, @sylvain_baillet @jasondasilvac and I develop a new approach to estimate intra-session stability of MEG derivatives
Constructive reviews led to addition of dSPM (+LCMV) and more - check it out! https://t.co/wTSYiGbApy
